text: allāhgē kæmættaṭa anuva (ohugē) niyōgayanṭa avanata vīmaṭa misa kisidu dharma dūtayaku api noevvemu. sæbævinma ovun ovunṭama aparādha karagat avasthāvaka, ovun num̆ba veta pæmiṇa, tavada ovun allāh gen samāva ayæda siṭiyadī, rasūl varayā ( vana obat) ovun venuven samāva æyada siṭiyē nam, allāh pāpakṣamāva piḷigannā lesat, asamasama karuṇāvanta lesat ovun dæka ganu æta
